Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes a cannabis processor tax credit
Summary: Establishes a cannabis processor tax credit; authorizes a tax credit that is the equivalent to the licensed processor's cannabis potency tax liability for the year two thousand twenty-three, multiplied by three, but shall not exceed four hundred thousand dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a cannabis processor tax credit
